alert.note: Alert for Northwest St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 7:09PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. Tammany Parish, southwestern Hancock and southwestern Pearl River Counties through 815 PM CST... At 709 PM CST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Abita Springs, or 8 miles southeast of Covington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Slidell, Picayune, Pearl River, Abita Springs, Pearlington, Lacombe, Stennis Space Center and Slidell Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 261 and 273. Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 12 between mile markers 63 and 84. Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany
